## edge connectivity
* [â†—](https://mathworld.wolfram.com/EdgeConnectivity.html) The edge connectivity, also called the line connectivity, of a graph is the minimum number of edges $\lambda(G)$ whose deletion from a graph $G$ disconnects $G$.
